resources:
Call AI Engine Convo AI Not Joined Call AI Engine End Call Joining Ending Failed to join. Please try again. Agent joined! At the beginning of the conversation, please speak loudly and clearly to help the AI agent better lock onto your voice. Agent Left! You Connecting… Timeout. Please try again. Agent left abnormally. Please try again. Network error. Please check your network settings. Agent left abnormally. Please try again. Room no longer exists. Please join a new call. The current preset resources are out of limit. Please try again later. RTM login failed.\n %s RTM retrieve token failed.\n %s Failed to retrieve token. LLM exception TTS exception All avatars are busy now. Please try again later.
INFO Channel Info Agent Status Agent ID Connected Room Status Room ID -- Participant-ID Your ID Your Network Disconnected Good Fair Poor NETWORK INFO Log Out More Actions Quick Report
Agent Settings AGENT Preset Voice Model Language AI Avatar Closed All DEVICE Advanced Settings Microphone Speaker Enable BHVS
IIH Intelligent Interruption Handling\n(IIH) This feature makes AI better understand you and reduces false interruption. Network Error! Connecting… Copied Interrupted You may start speaking Listening… Speak or tap to interrupt Speak or tap to interrupt Muted
Inbuilt Mic
Inbuilt Speaker
Permission Required Microphone permission is required for voice chat. Please grant the permission to continue. Video streaming requires camera permission. Please grant the permission to proceed. Please turn on notification permission to prevent background recording from being interrupted. Settings Retry Exit Tap here to return to the app.
AI Avatar Will Be Reset Reconfigure AI avatar after changing preset. Reconfigure AI avatar after changing language. Confirm CC
Conversational AI Device %d Devices My Devices
This preset does not support vision-related features. Please select another preset. Please connect and try again!
Only JPG, PNG, WEBP, and JPEG image formats are supported. Photo Camera Done We need access to your photo library to select images. Please enable photo access permission in Settings. We need access to your camera to take photos. Please enable camera access permission in Settings. Photo access permission allows preview of recent photos on the camera page. You can choose to skip this permission. Skip Enable Permission Settings Cancel
Official AI Agents Custom AI Agents Get Your AI Assistant Please contact Agora staff to obtain your custom agent ID. Enter Agent ID to Retrieve Retrieve Voiceprint The engine will learn your unique voiceprint to filter out other voices and background noise. Word-by-Word The transcript appears one word at a time, synchronized with the AI\'s speech. Streaming Text The transcript is displayed in chunks as they are generated by the AI. Transcript Display Mode Delete Agent Are you sure you want to delete agent \"%s\"? Delete Cancel Agent retrieved successfully. Failed to retrieve agent. No matching entry found in the current database. This agent is no longer available. Please contact Agora staff. Page failed to load. Please try again.
Voiceprint Lock Off Without this, the agent might be interrupted or distracted by other voices nearby. Seamless Mode AI automatically learns your voiceprint from your conversations with the agent and will ignore other people\'s voices. Personalized Mode Record a short voiceprint, and the agent will focus only on your voice. Local Personalized Voiceprint Create my voiceprint Record Record again Uploading… Loading Upload failed. Please try again. Sample text upload success. No voiceprint recorded You\'ll need a voiceprint to use Personalized Mode. The app will switch back to [Previous Mode] when you exit. Exit Please read aloud Please read this clearly and aloud.
It was the best of times, it was the worst of times \n\nIt was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness \n\nIt was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity Press and hold to record You can only save one voiceprint. Recording a new one will replace the current one. Release to save, slide up to cancel Release to cancel Sample text：%1s/%2s That\'s a bit too short. Please record for at least 10 seconds. Recording finished Sample text uploading… Sample text upload failed，Please try again. Ready for recording… Ready for recording Voiceprint from %s yyyy-MM-dd Voiceprint recording tips Your voiceprint is stored locally on your device by default. To use the Personalized voiceprint feature, we need to process a copy on our servers. This copy is deleted as soon as your session ends. We will never use your voice for any commercial purpose. AI-generated Avatar. Personal Data Protection Guide Welcome to the Agora Conversational AI Engine! By tapping Agree, you confirm you\'ve read and accepted our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy. If you don\'t agree, some features of the app will be unavailable. Agree Disagree Terms of Services Privacy Policy Information Advanced Features Off On Personalized Seamless More… Your voiceprint is stored locally on your device by default. To use the Seamless voiceprint feature, we need to process a copy on our servers. This copy is deleted as soon as your session ends. We will never use your voice for any commercial purpose. See our Privacy Policy for details.
Delete Account Important Notice Once deleted, your account and all its data will be permanently erased and cannot be recovered. I have understood the various risks associated with account cancellation. Confirm Deletion To continue, you must check the box to confirm you understand the risks. Settings Privacy Nickname My AI Persona Call me: How should we address you? Mr. Ms. Your Birthday When is your birthday？ About Me Click to set Select Set up your self-introduction to help the AI agent understand you better. My iot Devices %d devices linked Click to bind Version: %s User Agreement Privacy Policy Third-party data sharing Personal data checklist Update successful Update failed What should the agent call you? Tell us about yourself so the agent can get to know you better. ❤️ I\'m a bit of a homebody who loves taking care of my succulents and trying new recipes. My mom\'s lasagna is my ultimate comfort food, and I live for fresh summer berries. My friends say I\'m a great listener!> Digital marketer by day, wrestling with data and chasing the latest trends. I code to de-stress and am basically fueled by iced coffee. Always down to connect with other marketing nerds and swap ideas!> Front-end dev obsessed with pixel-perfect designs and the smoothest animations. An iced Americano is my secret weapon for productivity. On weekends, you\'ll find me grinding games. Always looking for other devs to trade bug-squashing stories with!> Product Manager who basically lives in Figma and Jira. I love sweating the details to get the user experience just right. My brain runs on cold brew and the latest tech news. Looking for other product folks to geek out on strategy with!>
Dial this number from your phone to start a conversation with our AI Agent. Enter your number below, and our AI Agent will call you. Calling now… please answer on your phone. Enter your mobile or landline number Call in progress… Call ended, please hang up Please enter a valid mobile or landline number Call out Call prompt About to call this number using your current phone, confirm? Call now Search country/region code… Search No Results Smart customer session limit: %d minutes. Daily call limit of 20 times has been exceeded
